channel.title: Powersuit Crash
channel.description:
Satisfactory Version: Experimental CL#127909 Mod Version: 0.3.2 Repeatable: Yes
Equipping the powersuit V1 my game imediately freezes and ctd's. I get no crash log on any crash with this crash. Going to try for version 2 but unable to atm.

item.title: Powersuit Crash
item.dc:creator: @Robb Rob B
item.description:
@Robb wrote:

Thanks for the report!

This should be fixed as of the latest PowerSuit and PowerSuit modules update (uploaded today). Please let me or Nog know if it continues to occur.

Read full topic

item.title: Powersuit Crash
item.dc:creator: @Degeneracy Degeneracy
item.description:
@Degeneracy wrote:

Update:
Made the Version 2 and equipped it, works without crashing.

Tested V1 again and it works without crashing. Might of been a client side incompatible error that was fixed in the last couple Xmas updates.

Read full topic
